name: Mirada
author: Kyle Vanderfox
description: Your new homescreen. A beautiful, minimal, and customizable new tab page.
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; style-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * 'self' data:; font-src * https://fonts.googleapis.com/; script-src 'self' https://www.reddit.com/; object-src 'self'; connect-src * https://source.unsplash.com/; frame-src * https://cdn.embedly.com/; media-src 'self' https://v.redd.it/; script-src-elem * https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/; frame-src * https://streamable.com/;
